name: Exastra — Adastra Fan Sequel
description:
This is a simple fangame set in the universe of Adastra, taking place after the events of the first game. 

This has been in development since December 2020, though that does include the many weeks where it wasn't even in my mind. I made it out of a pure love for the first game, and I have to say I'm pretty proud of myself for even pulling this together. 

This was made with my knowledge of the first release of Khemia and the original game. I haven't yet played any other content related to Adastra, so there may be some canonical inconsistencies.

Every asset and piece of art in this project has been taken from the original game, aside from minor edits I have made. Credit to HAPS for spritework, BlackSun for the backgrounds, and Compymono for UI and UX design.

Enjoy your experience, and feel free to leave your thoughts in the comments.
